漙字的基本解释

漙
tuán
（露）盛多：“野有蔓草，零露漙兮。”

漙
zhuān
古同“湍”，水名。

漙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuán］
［《廣韻》度官切，平桓，定。］
露多貌。《诗·郑风·野有蔓草》：“野有蔓草，零露漙兮。”毛传：“漙漙然盛多也。”一说为露珠圆貌。马瑞辰通释：“《釋文》：'本又作團。'《文選》李善注引《毛詩》：'零露團兮。'與《釋文》所引一本合。”高亨注：“漙，露珠圓圓的狀態。”

漙字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漙； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页645第29
【唐韻】度官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】徒官切，?音團。露多貌。【詩·鄭風】零露漙兮。　亦作團。【杜甫詩】玉露漙淸影。漙或作團。　又【集韻】豎兗切，音腨。義同。　又朱遄切，音專。與湍同。水名，出酈縣。或作漙。　【集韻】或作?。亦省作??。

漙字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
漙字的起名意思

露多貌。

So
Basic explanation of words
So
tuán
(Lu) Sheng Duo: "There are vines in the wild, and there is no dew."
So
zhuān
The ancient same "turbulent", the name of water.
So
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tuán］
["Guangyun" Duguanqie, Pinghuan, Ding. ]
Ludo looks. "Poetry·Zheng Feng·Wild Crawl": "Wild Crawl, with zero dew." Mao Chuan: "Congran and abundant." One said it was a round appearance of dewdrops. Ma Ruichen explained: ""Shi Wen":'Ben You Zuo Tuan.' "Wen Xuan" Li Shan's commentary "Mao Shi":'Zero Lu Tuan Xi.' and "Shi Wen" quoted in one book." Gao Heng's note: "Hey, the dewdrops are round."
So
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漙; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 645 29
[Tang Yun] Du Guan Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Di Guan Qi,? Sound group. Ludo looks. 【Poetry·Zheng Feng】zero dew.　 also as a group. [Poems of Du Fu] Yulu is a shadow. Or make a group.　[Jiyun] Vertical cutting, sound simmering. The same meaning.　Zhu Dunqie again, sound special. Same as Tuan. The name of the water is from Li County. Or make it.　【Jiyun】or make?. Also save for??.
So

Ludo looks.
tuán
прил. * обильный, густой (о росе)
